      • refreshNeighbouring

        public void refreshNeighbouring(java.lang.String node,
                                java.lang.String type)
        This method is called when an node is targeted. It refreshes the graph to redraw the node outgoing edges.
        Parameters:
        node - The name of the node.
        type - The type of the node.
